English: 

A group of inmates attempt a daring escape from the notorious Alcatraz 
prison island, from where no-one had managed to escape before. Based on 
a true story. The true story of Frank Morris, a convict who was sent to Alcatraz, 
the most feared prison in the world. Although nobody had ever escaped from Alcatraz, Frank did it.
